question: PLEASE PLEASE PELASE PELASE HELP?
question_content: Okayy so i weigh 103.4 lbs and i'm 5'1 and i'm 11 eyars old. Am i fat or skinny? pleaseeee tell me!

answers.answer_content:
Your not fat!!! Your not to skinny either! Your perfect weight for your age 11 year old's are spost to be between 100-110!
If people call you fat! Don't listen to them! Your not! :)
Look in the mirror and tell yourself YOU ARE BEAUTIFUL!

No, its a stage of a girl's life, when you hit puberty around 13-18 you'll get skinny and your body will mature and grow into a new form. By the way, it doesnt mean your fat, first off, normal for the height and second it might be because your bones are heavy, my friend is really skinny but she weighs more then me, and she told me cuz she has heavy bone, it doesnt really matter though, you shouldnt worry about your weight when your 11. i wish i was 5'1 when i was 11.

You then a aren't fat neither are you skinny but if you feel within yourself that you are a little chubby
then all you need to do is take an hour to go jogging each day remember I said "JOGGING" not running and you will soon have no worries about your weight.
